name: Tower Defence (leniapasia)
description:
Tower Defence is a 2D strategic PC game created in Unity. The player has to build towers to defend the Skeletons' army invasion. 12 towers and 10 Skeleton waves, can you protect your town?

Simply click the tower you want and can afford, and drag it with your mouse on the empty spot you chose. Every time a skeleton warrior is killed you earn money that you can use to build more defence towers.

With 12 spots for your towers and 10 skeleton invasion waves, choose each tower wisely to defeat the skeleton army and save your town! 

There are ten waves of Skeleton warriors and you can't let more than ten warriors cross your town. 

The Rock tower throws rocks from a close distance; the Arrow Tower throws arrows from a long distance and the Fire Tower throws fire from a long distance.
